justification: "Across many domains, an actor's (un)certainty when making a decision is reflected in their response times (Hyman, 1953; Vickers, 1970; Greene, 2007)."

topic_or_construct: decision conflict or uncertainty during action execution
measured_by: movement kinematics (smoothness, directness, jitter, maximum deviation)
justification: "The extent to which an actor is conflicted about a decision... is reflected in their movement kinematics... actors that are unconflicted... move more smoothly and directly... those conflicted... move less smoothly and less directly towards their chosen option (Kieslich & Hilbig, 2014)."

measured_by: participants' response times when choosing a partner
justification: "We used the participants' response times (RTs) when choosing between the two partners, as an exploratory index of how conflicted they were when making their choice."
